name: syntax_status_syntax_ticket_get
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ifc_bim_services.
Tool description: IFC models related BIM services
GITHUB Repository : https://github.com/aminov-jp/BIMIFCServices
API description: Fetch the result of a syntax check using a provided ticket from the IFC BIM Services API via RapidAPI.

ticket.description: The unique identifier for the syntax check result to be retrieved.
